mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SHORT_FORM ( SHORT_FORM_ID, PAYMENT_ITEM_ID, PRODUCT_ID, SHORT_FORM_URL, THUMBNAIL_IMAGE ) VALUES ( SEQ_SHORT_FORM_ID.NEXTVAL, #{paymentItemId}, #{productId}, #{shortFormUrl}, #{thumbnailImage} )
mapper.select:
SELECT SHORT_FORM_ID AS shortFormId, PRODUCT_ID AS productId, SHORT_FORM_URL AS shortFormUrl, THUMBNAIL_IMAGE AS thumbnailImage FROM SHORT_FORM WHERE IS_DELETED NOT IN ('1') ORDER BY CREATED_AT DESC
OFFSET #{page} * #{size} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{size} ROWS ONLY

SELECT SHORT_FORM_ID AS shortFormId, PRODUCT_ID AS productId, SHORT_FORM_URL AS shortFormUrl, THUMBNAIL_IMAGE AS thumbnailImage FROM SHORT_FORM WHERE SHORT_FORM_ID = #{shortFormId} AND IS_DELETED NOT IN('1')

SELECT r.SHORT_FORM_ID AS shortFormId, r.PRODUCT_ID AS productId, r.SHORT_FORM_URL AS shortFormUrl, r.THUMBNAIL_IMAGE AS shortFormThumbnailImage, r.CREATED_AT AS createdAt, p.PRICE AS price, p.NAME AS name, p.THUMBNAIL_IMAGE AS productThumbnailImage, p.DESCRIPTION_IMAGE AS descriptionImage, p.BARCODE AS barcode, p.DESCRIPTION AS description FROM SHORT_FORM r JOIN PRODUCT p ON r.PRODUCT_ID = p.PRODUCT_ID WHERE r.PRODUCT_ID = #{productId} AND r.IS_DELETED = 0 ORDER BY r.CREATED_AT DESC OFFSET #{page} * #{size} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{size} ROWS ONLY
